channel.title: Server changes
channel.description:
We've been working on a lot of changes for the server as of late, this has taken quite a while but we got there in the end. Moparcraft has had a lot of map resets, and server reconfigurations such as the temporary deactivation of PVP a short while ago all these changes have been inconsistent and usually didn't last very long. We realized this and decided to work on a better, permanent server configuration that would support a more positive and growing community.
Today, I would like to present the new Moparcraft. Allow me to explain in ordered format:
[ol][li]A completely new world, freshly generated, with a custom designed spawn temple and nice seed.[/li] [li]A complete reconfiguration, which includes no PVP, hard mode[/li] [li]A 1000x1000 world border[/li] [li]More community based commands, such as /home /spawn and a never seen before command /tpahere playername where you can request staff teleport to you if you need assistance[/li] [li]Other smaller changes such as staff titles and so on so we can assist better, especially to new players[/li] [li]You now have unlimited LWC locks, chests/furnaces are locked by default when placed so newer players aren't confused on commands. You can also protect rails. [/li] [li]Creepers disabled, as in explosion damage, fire doesn't spread from flint and steel or from lava.[/li] [li]Magnet chest enabled, items close to a chest go into it.[/li] [li]The world map has been updated, you can now see a players HP, and where they are despite being in cover (inside a building, or in water and so on).[/li][/ol]
Moparcraft will be advertised with this configuration, it was been rigorously discussed over the past few months and has finally been put into action. I know many of you will lose a lot of items due to this huge change, but it is for the better of the server, and I can assure you it is the last time you will lose your items.
We still use the same rollback plugins (core protect). I, personally, hope we can leave any other issues I had with any of you, or you had with others behind, and get a long as a community. If I have done something to bother you, please accept my sincerest apology.
Best of luck all! As always, you can find a staff member on the IRC, or use our suggestions board.
(The rules listed at spawn are basic, it is suggested you stick to stated forum rules as it says there).

item.title: Server changes
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:52, topic:447765”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=550653.msg4065379#msg4065379 date=1343840048]
So for now we can’t play?
[/quote]

You can play if you saved a copy of your minecraft jar that was still in 1.2.5, otherwise i’m sure the downgrader program will be updated in the next couple of days[/quote]

Daaaaaaamn…

I feel like this is a good time to ask for a map extention. Like 25m or something, lol. Half of a stronghold I’m repairing is outside of the limits

Read full topic

i think the old map should be uploaded, lot of people, not just me, worked hard in their homes and i’d like to keep it as a save, and i’m sure i’m not the only one that’d like that
at least consider the idea
[/quote]
it shouldnt be too hard. if it really is too big, then break up the download by sending it in packets. like 3 different downloads each holding a file contained a third of the files that makes up the world.[/quote]
plus i wouldnt think w2 would be that huge of a file, so breaking into 3-4 downloads should make it small enough for mediafire or other file sharers.
–i cant seem to edit my previous post which is why im adding on to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server changes
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:33, topic:447765”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=550653.msg4037026#msg4037026 date=1341282454]

It’s always been an even split, and we’ve had pvp for a while now so it seems fair to turn it back off. Maybe we should turn it on at some point in the future? (the server gets changed like 9999 times anyway, and every time someone says this is THE final change/reset)

tbh, i kinda agree. like every other month pvp is turned off and on.
i would also like to not this tho. because of the map reset, people are actually banding together to make villiges and that unites them, for now. Furthermore, during this construction it would be optimal to focus on building without worry of getting attacked in general and other reasons that would pop up. Even tho i am against pvp, i would think it would be best that after awhile and people settle into there built villages, we do the bimonthly (everyother month) of pvp off and on, so that everyone can be happy. because it is kinda is fun to fight aslong as its done for right reasons.
[/quote]Yeah it seems nice not having to worry about being attacked, and almost everyone is working together. But I can’t help but think that when we all have full diamond and massive castles we’ll be really bored… anyway we can just see how this turns out.

Exactly my point. Eventually it’s all just going to get old. People have already proven amazing builds can be done even with pvp in existance. There is no point in removing it.[/quote]

I personally don’t like to be killed, at all. It doesn’t matter about the “amazing builds” while pvp is on. pvping ends up with looting, and raiding. I don’t want to be a part of that.

Read full topic
